title: Jo. Gabrielis Drechsleri Amica Epistola Ad Adversarium suum, Virum Politioris literaturae laude eximium celeberrimumq[ue] Dn. Guilielmum Mechovium, In Illustri Collegio Lynenburg. ad D. Michael. Eloquent. & Histor. Profess. Publ. ac Nobilium Inspect.
creator: Drechsler, Johann Gabriel
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Drechsler, Johann Gabriel: Jo. Gabrielis Drechsleri Amica Epistola Ad Adversarium suum, Virum Politioris literaturae laude eximium celeberrimumq[ue] Dn. Guilielmum Mechovium, In Illustri Collegio Lynenburg. ad D. Michael. Eloquent. & Histor. Profess. Publ. ac Nobilium Inspect.  Qua Mentem circa iuventutis formandae modum paulo declarat uberius, & Euklērian suam Anti-Schurmannianam modeste defendit ; [Halae Saxonum, ipsis Kal. Ianuar. Anni ... M.DC.LXXVII.]. Halae Saxon.  Halae Saxon.  Berlin 1677
alternative: Qua Mentem circa iuventutis formandae modum paulo declarat uberius, & Euklērian suam Anti-Schurmannianam modeste defendit ; [Halae Saxonum, ipsis Kal. Ianuar. Anni ... M.DC.LXXVII.]
